repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Flyer for an American Labor Party mass meeting on October 19, 1938.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a flyer for an American Labor Party mass meeting of the 5th Assembly District in the Bronx, New York, on October 19, 1938. Among the speakers scheduled for the meeting were candidates for office running on the American Labor Party ticket.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: American Labor Party Meeting Flyer #5137m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
